top_complex_products.product: Machines and apparatus semiconductors, electronics (8486 HS12)
Bars of stainless steel, hot-rolled (7221 HS12)
Hydrides, nitrides, azides, silicides and borides (2850 HS12)
Articles for utensils, of cermet (8209 HS12)
Machining centers for working metal (8457 HS12)

browser_narrative.export_complexity: South Korea's largest goods exports are in high complexity products, Electronics and Machinery.
browser_narrative.growth_pattern: South Korea has seen a promising pattern of export growth, with the largest contribution to export growth coming from high complexity products, particularly Electrical machinery and equipment and Vehicles.
browser_narrative.structural_transformation: South Korea has completed the process of structural transformation. However, global market share in machinery manufacturing has fallen over the previous decade.
browser_narrative.growth_driver: South Korea's export growth in the past five years has been driven by Vehicles, driven by expanding its global market share.
browser_narrative.strategic_approach: Technological Frontier Approach - Having exploited virtually all major existing products, gains come from developing new products.
